file_content.text: These criminals wage illegal war against me in the streets. Eradicate all of Fa'athra's people who dare to set foot in Jiguuna!
Cripple this coward's army and you will know the honor and rewards of serving the great and powerful Nem'ro the Hutt.
Nem'ro + Fa'athra = enemies // Nem'ro = pay well if Fa'athra defeated
P8-47 = carrying urgent message // Message = sent by Nem'ro the Hutt // Mighty Nem'ro = all powerful ruler of Jiguuna
Message = meant for everyone // Nem'ro = making generous offer // P8-47 = deliver message or end up in scrap heap
Nem'ro = very powerful // Helping Nem'ro = profitable // P8-47 = deliver message or end up in scrap heap
I am mighty Nem'ro, ruler of Jiguuna! Citizens, hear me--my city is under siege from the craven Fa'athra and his followers!
Sounds like my kind of job.
P8-47 = relieved // Nem'ro = turn P8-47 into spare parts if message ignored // P8-47 = not ready for scrap heap
Nem'ro = honors all deals // Fa'athra = in violation of Hutt Cartel // Fa'athra = deal breaker // Nem'ro = legitimate claim to Jiguuna
P8-47 = tell Nem'ro job accepted // P8-47 = relieved // Nem'ro = turn P8-47 to scrap if message ignored
Nem'ro = dangerous to refuse // Nem'ro = turn P8-47 to scrap if message ignored // P8-47 = stay here for now
P8-47 = too busy to talk // P8-47 = on important mission for Nem'ro
